Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value. This product is worth more than just $100 to me, as it represents years of expertise and innovation. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own it at an introductory price of $150. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to make a decision soon. Thank you for considering this opportunity. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
